name: NOëL: La Niege
storyline: This time the game starts in the Christmas of 2014 when the player's character got injured skiing and he got help by three female high school students (Yumi Tachibana, Ryo Midorikawa, and Chisato Kadokura). After the incident, one of the girls (Yumi Tachibana) calls you on the video phone and told you that she wants to know how you are.
summary:
Noël: La Niege is the second game in the Noël series.

In the game you have to communicate with the three girls you met and get acquainted with them by talking to them with video phone and create a future for you and them.

The game features Japanese voice acting and lots of full motion video sequences.
